subject: Weight Lifting
Gold
lead_paragraph: Andrei Rybakov of Belarus set a world record of 412 pounds in the men’s 187-pound snatch and won three gold medals yesterday at the world championships in Chiang Mai, Thailand. Rybakov, 25, beat his own world mark by 2.2 pounds to take the title for a second straight year.
